testcase.classname: Verifying the AutoSaveAsDraft functionality in the Green Cleaning Policy Form
testcase.name: Verifying form draft is not saved if no change in the form in GCP
testcase.system-out: And User is on the Formv01 of Green Cleaning Policy form....................passed And User will not modify any field on the Green Cleaning Policy form........passed When User should not see saving of draft even after 10 seconds in Green Cleaning Policy form.passed

testcase.classname: Verifying the AutoSaveAsDraft functionality in the Green Cleaning Policy Form
testcase.name: Verifying form draft is not saved if upload files in the form in GCP
testcase.system-out: Given User should be able to see Upload fle on Green Cleaning Policy form...passed When User uploads any file on Green Cleaning Policy form....................passed Then User should not see saving of draft even after 10 seconds in GCP.......passed

testcase.classname: Verifying the AutoSaveAsDraft functionality in the Green Cleaning Policy Form
testcase.name: Verification of form data is saved automatically with date and time every 10 seconds when a change in cleaning service narrative
testcase.system-out: Given User should be able to see the cleaning service narrative in Green Cleaning Policy form.passed When User modifies the cleaning service narrative data in the Green Cleaning Policy form form and waits for 10 seconds.passed Then User can see the draft is saved automatically with date and time for cleaning service narrative in Green Cleaning Policy form.passed

testcase.classname: Verifying the AutoSaveAsDraft functionality in the Green Cleaning Policy Form
testcase.name: Verification of form data is saved automatically with date and time every 10 seconds when a change in Special Circumstances narrative
testcase.system-out: Given User should be able to see the Special Circumstances narrative in Green Cleaning Policy form.passed When User modifies the Special Circumstances narrative data in the Green Cleaning Policy form form and waits for 10 seconds.passed Then User can see the draft is saved automatically with date and time for Special Circumstances narrative in Green Cleaning Policy form.passed

testcase.classname: Verifying the AutoSaveAsDraft functionality in the Green Cleaning Policy Form
testcase.name: Verifying the form draft warning message is not retained when the form is saved in GCP
testcase.system-out: Given User can see the Draft is saved automatically with date and time in Green Cleaning Policy form.passed And User can see the save button in Green Cleaning Policy form..............passed When User saves the Green Cleaning Policy form..............................passed Then User verifies the form draft warning message is not retained in Green Cleaning Policy form.passed

testcase.classname: Verifying the AutoSaveAsDraft functionality in the Green Cleaning Policy Form
testcase.name: Verification of Clear Draft functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User can see the radio button in Green Cleaning Policy form for Certified cleaning service.passed When User clicks on the radio button of Certified cleaning service and waits for 10 seconds.passed And User can see the Clear draft in Green Cleaning Policy form..............passed And User clicks on Clear draft in Green Cleaning Policy form................passed Then User can see the draft is cleared in Green Cleaning Policy form........passed

testcase.classname: Verifying the AutoSaveAsDraft functionality in the Green Cleaning Policy Form
testcase.name: Verifying draft version is not changed and warning message is displayed with date and time after logout and login
testcase.system-out: Given User can see the narrative in Green Cleaning Policy form..............passed When User modifies narrative data in Green Cleaning Policy form.............passed And User will logout from the Green Cleaning Policy form....................passed Then User logs in again to Green Cleaning Policy form.......................passed And User should see the warning message is displayed with date and time at the top of the Green Cleaning Policy form.passed And User verifies draft version is not changed after logout and login in Green Cleaning Policy form.passed
